Or... You do as we say and I take one of you back with me London whether you like or not.

As FOUR SLEEPING BAGS are tossed into the TRUNK of Nick's

What am I supposed to do for three days sit home and knit Elizabeth exits the house looking very Out of Africa, car backpack.

What are you suddenly, the Brady Bunch?   This is ridic--
-- Hi, Meredith.  (off her look)  Everything okay?
Well, no, as a matter of fact, it isn't.  I didn't realiz you were going on this little outing and to tell you the with it.
I agree.  The ex-wife in the next sleeping bag is a littl weird...
Thank you.
I insist you come with us, really.    Meredith stops cold.
Liz ...
Nick, I messed-up up your entire weekend, it's the least do to pay you back.
Annie and Hallie exit-with Chessy.  As the Kids climb int they notice Elizabeth and Meredith come out of the house. tight black work-out gear. Hallie    Dad, what's Meredith doing here?
(getting behind the wheel)  Your mother invited her.  Be nice. The Girls look at each other, then to Chessy, as Meredith climbs into the front seat.
(closes door)  Okay.  Have fun everybody.
Liz, what are you doing?
I really think you and Meredith need time alone before th day. Annie   Mom!  Come on, that's not the plan.
Honestly, you'll have much more fun without me.
(having second thoughts)  Look, if you're not going... I don't have to go... Trust I'm not exactly a big nature girl.
But this'll be your chance to really get to know the girl Starting next week, they're half yours. Nick catches Elizabeth's eye.  She blows him a kiss.
Have fun yall'! As the car pulls off, Chessy turns to Elizabeth.
I would pay to see that woman climb a mountain.

as far as the eye can see.  CAMERA DISCOVERS Hallie and A climbing a steep hill, wearing back-pack and baseball cap Meredith, puffing and perspiring, dabbing sunscreen, on h balance.  Nick brings up the rear.  Meredith plops down o catch her breath.
I'm gonna kill my trainer... He says I'm in such great sh
(rubbing her legs)  I can't believe people actually do this for fun.
(calls)  Girls, hold on, we're stopping. Hallie  (coming back towards them)  Again?  Dad, at this rate, it'll take three days just to get up the mountain.
Meredith isn't used to the altitude... Just chill, okay? Behind Nick and Meredith, we SEE Annie SLIPPING LARGE ROC Meredith's Prada Backpack.

Somebody hand me my Evian... I can't move. Annie spots a SMALL LIZARD, grabs it and places it on top water bottle. Annie  Here you go, Mer. Meredith takes the bottle, lifts it to her mouth and find =-TO-EYE with the LIZARD.  She SCREAMS, tossing the Evian her balance and SLIPPING off the rock.
Honey, you okay? Annie  (catching the Lizard)  This little guy was on her Evian bottle, I guess.
(holding Lizard upside down by it's tail)  He won't hurt you, Mer.

(S CREAMS  again)  Get it away from me!  I hate things that .crawl.  It's disgusting... It's a lizard, it should be a belt.  U it?  Put it down! Annie   Okay. Annie walks behind Meredith and gently DEPOSITS the Lizar of Meredith's head.
Why don't I take the lead, you two help  Meredith. Nick moves off.  Meredith rises, still not knowing the Li on top of her head.
(to Girls)  Sure, you're going to help me... right over a cliff, you' help me. Hallie  (sotto, to Annie)   Not a bad idea.  See any cliffs?  Meredith GROANS as she now lifts her much heavier backpac
Annie  Need a hand?

(pulling away)  Not from you, thank you.  Don't think I can't see right past those angelic faces. one more trick from you two and miserable from the day I say 11 do'.  Got it? Hallie   Got it, Cruella.

(turns)   What'd you call me? Hallie   Nothing.  Not a thing...  (sotto)   Cruella.  (then, turns back)  oh, Mer... I think there's something on your head... The Girls-walk ahead.  Meredith reaches up and feels her then her HAND lands on the LIZARD.  She SCREAMS a BLOOD-C Lizard panics and runs down her
FACE and right INTO HER MOUTH.  Meredith's EYES BULGE, sh
SPITS the Lizard out, GAGGING and COUGHING.  Nick and the
Girls run back.
Are you okay?!?  What happened?! Bright RED and in SHOCK, Meredith stomps her feet and poi and Hallie.  We can almost see the smoke pouring out of h Annie  What did we do, Dad?  We were with you.
Meredith walks by herself, banging the buttons on her cel

Please work... Hello?  Hello? Meredith stops when she SEES Annie and Hallie bent over e something on the ground.  Meredith sneaks up behind them Annie  I didn't know they had mountain lions up here. Hallie   Oh yeah, the place is crawling with them.
(winks at Annie)  An old Indian guide once showed me how to keep them away.

(picks up TWO STICKS and hits them together)  Just do this and they'll never come near you. The Girls pick up sticks &,ad move off down the trail, CL them together.  Meredith stoops, picks up two sticks, CLA follows.
Nick, the Girls and Meredith sit around the campfire.  Ev eats trout, except Meredith, who sits on a rock, wrapped mosquitos and rubbing lotion on her arm.
Annie  You sure you don't want some trout, Mom?  Is that okay, b the way?  If we start calling you Mom?
I think your mother would prefer if you called me Meredit no thank you, I do not eat trout... for the thousandth ti breakfast.  What are we having?
Trout.
We always live off the trail up here, it's part of the experience.
(swatting away)  What's the other part, being eaten to death by mosquitos?
(swats at another mosquito, then looks at lotion)
You'd think they actually liked this stuff.

What is that you're using? (looks at the bottle, puts some on his hand)  You're going to attract every mosquito on the mountain.  This is sugar and water... Where’d you get this stuff? Meredith looks to the Girls, who busy themselves eating.
That's it.  I’m taking a large sleeping pill and going to bed. She picks up her two sticks and WHACKS them together as s toward her tent.
Sweetheart, what are you doing?
I don’t want the mountain lions to...
(realizes she's been had)  --There are no mountain lions up here, are  there? 122
Nick shakes his head.  Meredith glares at the Girls, drop sticks in the fire, walks to Nick and gives him a lusciou Girls and marches off to her tent.
I'm telling you guys, lay off.  This isn't her thing, okay?  I'm not marrying her because she's Annie Oakley. Annie   Who’s Annie Oakley?
Just cool it.
Everything is quiet.  An Owl HOOTS in the distance.  The sneak out of their tent and tiptoe over to Meredith's ten

The Girls step inside, see Meredith fast asleep on her ai mattress.  They position themselves at Meredith's head an "count of three", LIFT her up on her mattress.  It isn't they carry her out, Meredith -moves her arm, brushing her Hallie twitches her nose but keeps going. The Girls step out of the tent carrying Meredith on her m CAMERA TRACKS them down a path to the lake-front, where t into THE LAKE, nod to each other and push her off. Hallie  (watching Meredith drift away)  Sweet dreams, Mommy Dearest.
Meredith is sound asleep on her back in the middle of the BIRD rests on-her nose.
She flops an arm into the water.
(in her sleep)  That feels so nice...

She gently moves her fingers in the water, then her EYES OPEN.  She looks straight up as the BIRD flaps its wings face.  Meredith SC sits up, realizes she's in the middle again, her voice ECHOING off the mountains.
Niiiiiick!!!!!! Nick sticks his head out of his tent, half-asleep, spots thrashing around, screaming, in the middle of the lake.
What's she doing in the lake? Hallie and Annie peek out of their tent and see Meredith to the shore in her soaking wet pajamas.  She storms past coffee pot into the air and marches up to Nick.
What's going on?
Here's what's going on, buddy, the day we say I do" is th day I ship those brats off to Switzerland.  Get the pictu them.  Take your pick.
Them.
Excuse me?
(spells)  T-H-E-M.  Get the picture?
Elizabeth sits on a rocker on the front porch, reading wh Nick and the Girls pull up.  She rises to greet them.
Back so soon?  Did you have fun? Annie  Not exactly. 124
Hallie  We've been punished through the end of the century.
Starting now.  Go.
Where's Meredith? Hallie    We played a couple of harmless tricks on her and she kinda freaked out a little.
A little?  (shows Elizabeth the ring)    We broke up.
oh, jeez ... This-is all my fault.  If I hadn't suggested she go...
-- Tricked her would be more like it.    Like mother, like daughters...
I'm really sorry, Nick. Annie     We are too, Dad... really. Hallie     Will you forgive us?
Up to your room!  (when they're gone, he smiles)     I gotta remember to thank them one day.
You're relieved?
I think I am.   (not wanting to talk about it)   I’m also starving... Chessy around?
She and Martin went off on a picnic around noon... yester
(Nick looks up on that one)
Hopefully they'll be back... soonish...
Who would've thought my Nanny and you Butler...  (then)  So, listen, how 'bout I whip us up something to eat?
You know how to cook now?
of course, I )mow how to cook.  I can make pasta... and pasta... and...
Pasta sounds good.
Nick, now clean shaven and wearing fresh clothes, passes room.  Inside, we SEE Hallie and Annie in pajamas, gettin Hallie  Wow!  You look so nice, where are you going.
(shutting their door)  Good night, Ladies!
Elizabeth sets the table as Nick enters.
Smells good in here.
Really?  I'm just boiling water.
oh. Then it must be you...  (takes out wine glasses)  So what are you in the mood for, red or white?
I think red.
Follow me...
leading to Nick's private WINE CELLAR.  A cavernous space beautiful lanterns.  The walls are lined with bottles of the walls, library style.
This is where I keep my private stash. Did you know I als collect wine?
Oh really?
Yeah, I'm a man of limited interests. Elizabeth laughs.  Nick leads her into a small cozy room, bottle from a rack.
Here's a 1921 Burgundy... They say the rain that year mad the best Burgundy ever harvested... Oh wait, you'll appre
(shows her another bottle)
(reads label)  Vi Day, 1946... incredible.
Yeah, I love that...  (shows her another bottle)  The same wine my parents served at their wedding... a 152 Bordeaux.  I think my sister was conceived off this baby.
What's this-one?  (reads label)  Where Dreams Have No End... 1983.
That one actually took me years to track down.
Why, where's it from? 127
It's the wine we drank at our wedding.  I now have every bottle ever made.
(completely thrown)  You do?
I do.
Can we open one?
You're the only one I'd drink it with. Nick pulls a bottle from the shelf, dusts it off.  He loo Elizabeth and sees her eyes are teary.
You okay?
Just got a little dust in my eye...
I can offer you a clean sleeve to...
(pulling back from the offer)   No, no, I'm fine, now.  Really.' All better.
You don't always have to be so brave, you know.
Oh, but I do, actually... just then, they HEAR the cellar door opening above them a
Anybody home? Nick hesitates, looks to Elizabeth, who shrugs.
Yeah... We're on our way up...
Nick and Elizabeth climb the stairs and enter the KITCHEN greeted by Martin and Chessy.  Martin wears shades and a
Welcome back... How was the picnic?
Who knew the man wanted to eat in L.A.?  We drove eight h have a picnic in a city with no parks.
But what a town!  I saw mountains, beaches, I saw Michael not to mention I found out I have the same hand size as J as John Barrymore.
The man is a lot to handle... but a lot of fun.  How was the camping trip?  Aren't you back early?  Are we interru We are.  Let's go, Marty.
No, no, you're not interrupting anything. Are you hungry? the mood for some pasta? Nick looks at Elizabeth, wishing she hadn't invited them
You don't mind?  We haven't eaten since Hearst Castle.
No, no, it's fine.
I'll set the table for two more... As Chessy and in Join them, Nick slips the bottle of-wine and closes the door.
lined up IN FRONT OF NICK'S HOUSE.  CAMERA TILTS UP as El comes down the front steps and joins Annie and Martin, wh
Okay, then, I guess that's that.  We're really off this time.

sadly watching as a Cab Driver loads the baggage into the The Girls hug and promise to see each other over Thanksgi and promise to see each other over Christmas... Then Nick and Elizabeth hug in a distant way and let go v
Take care of yourself.
You too. The trunk is closed and Elizabeth hugs Hallie hard... Nic Annie.  Elizabeth, Annie and Martin wave, then duck into pulls off, Chessy, Hallie and Sammy all look up to Nick.

Elizabeth and Annie ENTER, dropping their bags by the fro door.
Hi ... We're home  They don't bear anything.  Annie  (calls out)  Grandfather?
I'll check his study. Elizabeth ENTERS THE STUDY, and sure enough, there he is, the desk, hidden behind The Financial Times.
Hey stranger...
The paper comes down and Elizabeth SEES it's Hallie sitting behind the desk. Hallie  Hi, Mom.  Did you know the Concorde gets you here in half the time?

(stunned)   Yeah, I've heard that...  Annie arrives in the door behind Elizabeth, shocked to se Hallie.  Annie    What are you doing here?  Hallie  it took us around thirty seconds after you left to realiz didn't want to lose you two again.
We?

(appears from the doorway  behind Hallie)  We. I made the mistake of not coming after you once, Lizz I wasn't going to do it again... no matter how brave you 'Elizabeth looks across the study at Nick, her eyes once up, a smile on her face.
Thank you. They stand frozen, their eyes locked on each other.
Annie  Pssst.... She signals for Hallie to Join her in the hall.
Hallie rushes up to Annie. Hallie  We did it!  We did it!
They hug. Annie     It's unbelievable. Hallie OhmyGod, you guys are gonna love living in California.... Annie What do you mean ... California?  You two are going to lo in London... Hallie  London???

embracing by the window.  CAMERA PULLS BACK through the W CONTINUES into THE FRONT YARD, revealing Chessy and Marti CAMERA BOOMS UP and AWAY finally REVEALING Sammy barking Poodle in the yard next door.  And as Grandfather walks d garden gate and enters the path to the house, we fade out
